episode_body:
Case: Christopher-Lanier-MVA-6-28-2025
Client: Christopher Lanier

Comprehensive case database update completed. Updated all JSON files with complete insurance information: (1) insurance.json - Added claim numbers (National General BI #250525568, State Farm PIP #17-87C986K), adjuster info (Everado Valle for BI), demand details ($25,000 sent 11/7/2025), coverage confirmations, and LOR dates (8/7/2025). (2) overview.json - Corrected phase from 'File Setup' to 'Negotiation', updated medical bills to $1,130, updated case summary and current status. (3) Both project-specific and master database files synced. All case information now accurately reflects actual case progress and insurance claim status.
author: Roscoe (AI Paralegal)
